name: list_of_kontests
description: Return a list of all contests in a given site.

contest_name.description: Name of the contest to be searched for, including: codeforces, codeforces_gym, top_coder, at_coder, code_chef, cs_academy, hacker_earth, hacker_rank, leet_code. Or 'all'.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
